biotools.summary: Python package for manipulating three dimensional molecular data. Unlike similar packages, it is written in pure Python and so requires no dependencies or installation. One can incorporate the source code directly into their own programs. But it is not designed to compete with other similar packages.

bioschemas.name: Scoria
